Title: Lit
Presenters: Guns for Writers - What Writers Should Know About Firearms For Their Work
All Day Event: 'Come talk about guns with a firearms instructor and writer. The panel will briefly discuss the history of firearms with a focus on modern and near future tech. Learn more about how guns work- how to write convincing scenes with firearms- and how knowing more about guns can help both your world building and character development. NOTE: This is NOT the 'Geeks with Guns' event. '
